name: analyze_metadata_mads_tool
description: Specialized tool for extracting MADS 2.1 compliant metadata from document images. ONLY use for: library and archival documents requiring MADS (Metadata Authority Description Schema) 2.1 standard compliance, authority records, bibliographic descriptions, and institutional repository processing. NOT for: general metadata, content analysis, text extraction, diagrams, or tables. If no MADS-relevant content is found, returns that no MADS metadata was detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the image. Use this OR image_data, not both.

image_data.description: Base64-encoded image data. Use this OR image_path, not both. Preferred when image is already in memory.

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials

result.description: Analysis result from Metadata Mads Analyzer
